title: My Ranch - Novel Updates
genre: Ecchi   Harem   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Animal Rearing   Beast Companions   Bloodlines   Death of Loved Ones   Domestic Affairs   Farming   Male Protagonist   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Politics   Polygamy   Prostit**es   Racism   Servants   Sudden Wealth   Wealthy Characters
author: 终级BOSS飞
description: Blue sky, white clouds, lazily lying on the beach, while feeling the gentle breeze coming from the sea. Hounds at the side with marine animals chasing each other around. Cups of unrivaled wine from his personal winery with cuts of prime A grade steaks readily around. For others, life is all about pursuing money, power, and fame, but for Jiang Hai, this type of lifestyle is what he constantly dreamed of.>
